title: An Act authorizing the state board of retirement board to provide for the payment of retirement benefits to Dale R. Kiley

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Berthiaume of Spencer and Senator Durant, a joint petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Donald R. Berthiaume, Jr., and Peter J. Durant relative to the retirement benefits of Dale R. Kiley, a retired state trooper.  Public Service.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Public Service

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/20/2025 from 05:00 PM-05:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
